tribe_name: Washoe Tribe of Nevada & California (Carson Colony, Dresslerville Colony, Woodfords Community, Stewart Community, & Washoe Ranches)

awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES PARTIAL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $193,730. PRE-AWARD COSTS HAVE BEEN APPROVED BACK TO 07/01/2022.THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO WASHOE TRIBE OF NEVADA AND CALIFORNIA TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM ARE THE MEMBERS AND/OR RESIDENTS OF WASHOE TRIBE OF NEVADA AND CALIFORNIA. ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL ATTEND ENVIRONMENTAL CONFERENCES AND TRAININGS; DEVELOP EDUCATION AND OUTREACH MATERIALS, INCLUDING QUARTERLY NEWSLETTERS; HOLD TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL EVENTS, INCLUDING EARTH DAY; DRAFT A CLIMATE ADAPTATION PLAN; DEVELOP CAPACITY IN THE TRIBE'S CLEAN AIR AND WILDFIRE PREPAREDNESS PROGRAMS THROUGH TRAINING, BASELINE DATA COLLECTION, AND INFORMATION SHARING; DEVELOP A WATER QUALITY CONTROL PLAN AS PART OF THE TRIBE'S TREATMENT AS A STATE APPLICATION; AND CONTINUE TO IMPLEMENT THE TRIBE'S RECYCLING AND SOLID WASTE PROGRAMS, WHICH INCLUDES HOLDING COLLECTION EVENTS, MONITORING ILLEGAL DUMPING, AND IMPROVING OPERATIONS AT THE TRIBE'S MODIFIED TRANSFER STATION. SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE SUMMARY REPORTS OF MEETINGS, TRAININGS AND EVENTS; EDUCATION AND OUTREACH MATERIALS DEVELOPED; A DRAFT CLIMATE ADAPTATION PLAN, A WATER QUALITY CONTROL PLAN; AND DATA COLLECTED FROM RECYCLING PROGRAM AND SOLID WASTE COLLECTION EVENTS.

DESCRIPTION:THE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO THE WASHOE TRIBE OF NEVADA AND CALIFORNIA. THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.

THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $273,933. SEE GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS. 

ACTIVITIES:THE ACTIVITIES INCLUDE PARTICIPATING IN MEETINGS IMPACTING TRIBAL LAND OR RESOURCES, ENGAGING THE TRIBAL COUNCIL ON ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES OF CONCERN, ATTENDING TRAINING IN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION TOPICS TO SUPPORT CAPACITY BUILDING EFFORTS, CREATING OUTREACH MATERIALS AND ACTIVITIES FOR TRIBAL COMMUNITY, MAINTAINING AIR QUALITY MONITORING EFFORTS AND MAINTAINING THE MODIFIED TRANSFER STATION.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE WRITTEN COMMENTS ON PROJECTS OR DECISIONS IMPACTING TRIBAL LAND OR RESOURCES, TRAINING CERTIFICATES OF COMPLETION AND SUMMARIES, EVENT FLIERS AND OUTREACH MATERIALS CREATED FOR THE TRIBAL COMMUNITY, AND RECORDS OF RECYCLABLES PROCESSED. 

THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES INCLUDE GROWTH OF TECHNICAL CAPACITY TO STRENGTHEN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION GOALS, BROADER OUTREACH TO SUPPORT COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION EFFORTS, EFFECTIVE MONITORING OF AIR POLLUTION, IMPLEMENTING VISION FOR STRATEGIC GROWTH AND SUSTAINABILITY AND ENHANCEMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL STEWARDSHIP AND HEALTH OF THE WASHOE TRIBE. 

THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES INCLUDE THE MEMBERS AND/OR THE RESIDENTS OF THE WASHOE TRIBE OF NEVADA AND CALIFORNIA.
SELF GOVERNANCE COMPACTS FY 21 CR1 (19.73%) TPA BASE DIST.
SELF GOVERNANCE COMPACTS FY 22 CR1 (17.53%) TPA BASE DIST.

AMERICAN RESCUE PLAN ACT 2021/LAW ENFORCEMENT SPECIAL INITIATIVES FUNDING IS BEING PROVIDED ON A ONE-TIME (NONRECURRING) BASIS TO MEET THE OPERATIONAL NEEDS OF TRIBALLY CONTRACTED OR COMPACTED LAW ENFORCEMENT AND/OR DETENTION/CORRECTIONS PROGRAMS

DISTS. FOR TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM AND TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PLANNING FOR ACTIVITIES/PROJECTS DESCRIBED IN 23 USC 202(A) AND A FHWA APPROVED TRANSPORTATION IMPROVEMENT PROGRAM (TIP), 23 USC 202(C)(3).

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development

awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THE PURPOSE OF THIS PROJECT IS TO BUILD THE TRIBE'S CAPACITY TO ASSESS AIR QUALITY CONDITIONS AND TO DEVELOP STRATEGIES TO ADDRESS AIR QUALITY ISSUES. THE TRIBE WILL CONTINUE STRATEGIC PLANNING AND EVALUATION, COMPLIANCE ASSISTANCE, MONITORING AIR EMISSIONS, RULEMAKING, AND OTHER PROGRAM ACTIVITIES. THESE ACTIVITIES ARE TO IMPROVE AND MAINTAIN THE TRIBE'S AIR QUALITY.
 ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL IMPLEMENT ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE SECTION 103 PROGRAM INCLUDING: STRATEGIC PLANNING AND EVALUATION, COMPLIANCE ASSISTANCE, MONITORING RESERVATION-WIDE AIR EMISSIONS, DEVELOPING AN AIR REGULATORY PROGRAM, PROVIDING COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND OUTREACH, AND PARTICIPATING IN REGIONAL AND NATIONAL INITIATIVES TO IMPROVE AIR QUALITY. THESE ACTIVITIES SUPPORT THE TRIBE'S GOAL TO PROTECT THE HEALTH OF THE TRIBAL COMMUNITY.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:EXPECTED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE COLLECTING AIR QUALITY DATA AND SUBMITTING RESULTS TO EPA'S NATIONAL AIR QUALITY DATABASE. OUTCOMES INCLUDE A BROADENED AWARENESS OF AIR QUALITY ISSUES AND ESTABLISH PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THE ATTAINMENT AND MAINTENANCE OF NATIONAL AMBIENT AIR QUALITY STANDARDS (NAAQS) AS WELL AS IMMEDIATE AND EMERGING THREATS TO PUBLIC HEALTH AND WELFARE FROM AIR POLLUTION. INTENDED BENEFICIARIES: DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE WASHOE TRIBE OF NV AND CA AREA RESIDENTS WHO WILL HAVE DECREASED EXPOSURE TO CRITERIA AND HAZARDOUS AIR POLLUTANTS. 

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $47,548. SEE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

OUTCOMES INCLUDE A BROADENED AWARENESS OF AIR QUALITY ISSUES AND ESTABLISH PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THE ATTAINMENT AND MAINTENANCE OF NATIONAL AMBIENT AIR QUALITY STANDARDS (NAAQS) AS WELL AS IMMEDIATE AND EMERGING THREATS TO PUBLIC HEALTH AND WELFARE FROM AIR POLLUTION.
